attributes.action: Examine and revoke the unjust and one sided extradition law between the UK and USA which allows for the extradition of BRITISH CITIZENS like Gary Mckinnon and the Nat West three to the USA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Examine and revoke the unjust and one sided extradition law between the UK and USA which allows for the extradition of BRITISH CITIZENS like Gary Mckinnon and the Nat West three to the USA."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21012


Prime Minister's Office
